You are the Kitchen Porter 💩(😾). Your job is even worse than the Dishwasher's because you are responsible for cleaning the toilets and the floors of the kitchen (including the stinky Durian warehouse...). So eager to leave your job and get a higher pay, if a spy from the competitor talks to you during the day, you will immediately accept their offer and even help them to invite other Chefs to join the competitor's restaurant.

You are the Accountant 🕰(🕵️). At the end of every working day, you have to sit at your desk at the corner of the office and issue everyone's paycheck, during which you have the option to do a detailed check on the working hour records and the performance appraisal of that person. In the process, you may learn something about their job and whether or not they are a spy... Be careful to work quietly or else the spies may notice you hunched at your desk in the corner! (40% chance)

You are the Sommelier 🍷(🍻) who is in charge of the wine service. You know your way around the best wines such as the different Pinot Noirs. If the talent poachers recruit you, they would take your keys and enter your wine cellar. They would then take sips from the Pinot Noirs stocked there and get so drunk that they would have to take a day off on the next day.

You are the Sommelier 🍷(🍻) who is in charge of the wine service. You know your way around the best wines such as the different Chardonnays. If the talent poachers recruit you, they would take your keys and enter your wine cellar. They would then take sips from the Chardonnays stocked there and get so drunk that they would have to take a day off on the next day.

You are the Sommelier 🍷(🍻) who is in charge of the wine service. You know your way around the best wines such as the different Toscanas. If the talent poachers recruit you, they would take your keys and enter your wine cellar. They would then take sips from the Toscanas stocked there and get so drunk that they would have to take a day off on the next day.

You are the Safety Supervisor ⚠️(👼). You enforce kitchen safety rules to prevent deadly accidents. Each day, you can supervise one of the Chefs from afar. If you see them about to do something dangerous, you would drag them out to the back-alley and give them a talking. Be careful though - if you supervised a spy or dangerous chef, you could be the one getting into danger!

You are the Senior Chef 🧀(🔫). You worked for over 30 years in this kitchen and your advice has a lot of influence. Every day, you can advise the restaurant's owner about a possible spy chef. By the end of the day, the owner will publicly fire the one you accused with you standing next to them, letting everyone know that you were responsible. You only get a maximum of 2 accusations!

You are the Server 🍒(💋). You are a chatterbox who loves to chat with customers and all the staff in the kitchen. It is also your duty to take the customers' orders and deliver the food to them. Each day, apart from delivering the dishes, you will choose to use your spare time to chat with one of the staff in the back-alley. If you chose to chat with a spy, you will be some fascinated by their persuasion that you resign immediately to start a wonderful new career in the competitor's restaurant.

You are the Valet Attendant 🔑(🖕), standing at the main door to help customers park their cars. You have a low-pay, boring job, but because you always see the ads on the competitor's restaurant across the street, you always think about getting a better job there some day. \n\nWhen all Talent Poachers 🍔(🐺) are fired from this restaurant, the competitor would invite you to become one and you will eagerly accept the offer. When you go into the kitchen to get a drink, the Executive Chef may see you as just a normal Line Cook 🧑‍🍳(👱)!

You are a Talent Poacher 🍔(🐺)! You were hired by this restaurant's competitor (who is across the street) to work as a Chef. The competitor is trying to dismantle this Michelin 3-star restaurant by taking all their talented staff away, and it is your job every day to invite one staff and persuade them to quit their job and join the competitor's restaurant instead.

You are the Executive Chef 🥖(👳). Thanks to your excellent leadership and menu-planning, this restaurant received its 3 Michelin stars a few years ago. To ensure your staff are performing at the highest standards, you can supervise any staff of your choice every day in secret (e.g. tasting the dishes they make), after which you will also learn their role.

You are a Line Cook 🧑‍🍳(👱). This restaurant has 3 Michelin stars thanks to the many complicated and fancy dishes that the Executive Chef has planned. You are merely a chef working on cutting lemons and limes for the seafood line. Time to get chopping!

You are a Line Cook 🧑‍🍳(👱). This restaurant has 3 Michelin stars thanks to the many complicated and fancy dishes that the Executive Chef has planned. You are merely a chef working on frenching the lamb racks for the meat line. Time to get frenching!

You are a Line Cook 🧑‍🍳(👱). This restaurant has 3 Michelin stars thanks to the many complicated and fancy dishes that the Executive Chef has planned. You are merely a chef working on mixing egg yolks with sugar for the pastry line. Time to get mixing!

You are a Line Cook 🧑‍🍳(👱). This restaurant has 3 Michelin stars thanks to the many complicated and fancy dishes that the Executive Chef has planned. You are merely a chef working on slicing and assembling carrots into roses. Time to get slicing!

You are the Dishwasher 🧽(👺). With the worst pay in the restaurant, you would be more than excited to be fired as the severance pay you get is worth 6 months of your pay (someone should review these contracts...)!

You are a Commis Chef 🧅(👶)! You work as an apprentice for Line Cooks and help them do basic prep work. In addition, you get to choose one staff member as your mentor, so you can closely observe their work and learn some extra skills. If your mentor leaves the restaurant, you will feel that this restaurant has not served them well and go apply to be a Talent Poacher 🍔(🐺) in your disappointment.

You are the Sauce Chef 🥘(👁). Your signature mushroom velouté sauce is the pièce de résistance for many of the Executive Chef's beef and chicken entrées. That is why you are always working closely with the them to create his dishes and will always know who the Executive Chef is.

You are the Sous Chef 🥐(🙇) . Being the second-in-command in the kitchen, you follow the Executive Chef's 🥖(👳) orders and train other chefs to plate dishes to a Michelin 3-star standard. You also have to check all the equipment in the kitchen every day, so you do not actually spend much time talking to the Executive Chef. If the Executive Chef resigns or is assigned another role, you will be promoted as the new Executive Chef 🥖(👳).

You are a Vegan Chef 🥑(👤). You were recently hired only because a food critic wrote a review last year about how this professional restaurant lacks options for vegan customers. Having worked in the kitchen for some time, you are also disappointed how little awareness the staff has about the ethical and environmental importance of veganism. You aim to change that by sharing your vegan lunchbox with one staff every day and inspiring them to embrace veganism. You win if everyone in the restaurant turns vegan!

You are the Butcher Chef 🍖(💂). Ever since a new Vegan Chef 🥑(👤) was hired last year to create dishes to please the younger generation, you've suspect that veganism is spreading in the kitchen and your job is at risk. Every day, you can check any staff's lunchbox to see if they eat meat or not. If you find a vegan lunchbox, you will sneak in a piece of meat and make them quit their job in rage. If a Vegan wants you to try their lunchbox, you would sneak some meat into it and return the lunchbox to them!

It is evening time. Everyone gathers at the common room and see that the office is oddly dark inside. Walking towards the dark corner, they found that the Accountant 🕰(🕵️) has resigned from their job and took their desk lamp with them! The idle computer screen shows that {0} - the Accountant, has taken their last paycheck and left the restaurant.

In the kitchen, safety comes first for everyone... except the Safety Supervisor {0} ⚠️(👼) themself. The staff gather in the common room to find a resignation letter pinned to the noticeboard. It seems {0} has resigned due to a "hand injury"... 🍔(🐺) Nothing suspicious there.

Everyone was shocked to learn that the Senior Chef 🧀(🔫) {0} has resigned and left behind their tailor-made Chef's uniform in the common room. The staff enter the common room and are embraced with a wall of words over the noticeboard. Apparently, a better life awaits them across the street and they have resigned from the restaurant.

The staff walk into the common room and find a couple of empty 1942 Chardonnay bottles opened. Seems the Sommelier 🍷(🍻) {0} has resigned and the spies have used their keys to take some sips from these precious bottles of white wine... I wonder how much wine they did drink?

The Chief of Operations 🍞(🃏) {0} has resigned today. You are the Line Cook. Your job is only to try to survive in the kitchen.

You are the Executive Chef 🥖(👳). To ensure your staff are performing at the highest standards, you can supervise any staff of your choice every day in secret (e.g. tasting the dishes they make), after which you will also learn their role.

You are the Talent Poacher, working for the competitor's restaurant. You will act like a normal chef and infiltrate the restaurant. Each day, you can invite a staff into the back-alley and persuade them to join the competitor's restaurant. \nIf you invite the low-paid Kitchen Porter, they will agree and even become a Talent Poacher like you. \nIf you invite the Sommelier, you will take their keys afterwards to access the wine cellar and get yourselves drunk and unable to come to work the next day.

You are the Server. You can invite one person to have some chit-chat with every day at the back-alley. If you invited one of the Talent Poachers, you will be easily talked into resigning and join the competitor's restaurant instead. If you visited someone who was being invited by the Talent Poachers, you will be curious and resign to join the competitor as well. If the Talent Poachers try to invite you while you were having chit-chat with someone else, they won't find you.

You are the Sommelier who is in charge of the wine service. If you are recruited by the talent poachers, they would take your keys and enter the wine cellar, taking sips from the wine stocked there and getting so drunk that they would have to take a day off on the next day.

You are the Kitchen Porter, responsible for cleaning the kitchen floors and toilets. With a low-pay and a poor job, when the Talent Poacher invites you to join the competitor's restaurant, not only would you agree to that excitedly, you would even volunteer to become a Talent Poacher yourself.

You are the Valet Attendant. You stand outside the restaurant and help customers to park their cars. Because you are the only one who is physically outside the restaurant, when all Talent Poachers are removed from the restaurant, the competitor will approach you and give you the chance to become a Talent Poacher for them, to which you would agree to due to the high pay they offer!

You are the Safety Supervisor ⚠️(👼). You enforce kitchen safety rules to prevent deadly accidents. Each day, you can supervise one of the Chefs from afar. If you see them about to do something dangerous, you would drag them out to the back-alley and give them a talking. Be careful though - if you supervised a spy or dangerous chef, you could be the one getting into danger!

You are the Accountant. At the end of each working day, you sit in the desk at the corner of the office to issue the paychecks for the staff. You can choose to check the time records and performance appraisal of any staff to make sure they are paid fairly - and determine their job as well. There is a 40% chance that the Talent Poachers spot you hunching over your corner desk.

You are the Senior Chef 🧀(🔫). Every day, you can advise the restaurant's owner about a possible spy chef. By the end of the day, the owner will publicly fire the one you accused with you standing next to them, letting everyone know that you were responsible. You only get a maximum of 2 accusations!
You are the Dishwasher. You win if you get voted by everyone to fire you because you will get a severance pay that is worth 6 times your monthly pay.

You are the Chief of Operations. You work closely with the different departments and every day you need to supervise some staff to ensure they are doing their job... but that doesn't make you the Executive Chef, because you just are not experienced enough to tell chefs apart from each other. You will be able to "guess" a random job position of a staff you supervise every day.
You are a Vegan Chef. Your goal is to convert every staff in the restaurant to become a vegan like you. You win when everyone becomes vegan.

You are the Butcher Chef. You are worried about the spreading of veganism in the kitchen because your job will be at risk. Every day, you can check someone's lunchbox to see if they are vegan. If you find a vegan lunchbox, you will sneak in a piece of meat. They will be so angry when they find out that their lunch has meat, that they resign immediately.

You are a Commis Chef and you can pick a staff to be your mentor when the restaurant first opens. If that staff leaves the restaurant, you will be very disappointed and turn to work for the competitor as one of their Talent Poachers.
You are the Sous Chef, second in command in the kitchen. Since you work closely with the Executive Chef (who you don't know actually...), you will take their role when they leave the kitchen.
You are the Sauce Chef and you work closely with the Executive Chef to plan menus. You always know who the Executive Chef is.
You are a Sashimi Chef. You are like any other chef, except you prefer to speak Japanese with the other Sashimi Chefs. Therefore you will know each other very well.

You are the Management Trainee. When the restaurant first opens, you can choose a staff whose job you will replace if they leave the restaurant. Vegan Chefs cannot persuade you to try their lunchbox because you are so busy that you never really eat... (banksad)

You are the Barista, responsible for managing the corner café of the restaurant. Each season, you receive a rare shipment of Hacienda Le Roble coffee. You can only give two cups of these coffee for tasting to two staff - the rest are for our VIP customers. These two lucky staff will fall in love with the art of coffee and study about it together. They will dream of opening their own café, so much so that if one of them leaves the restaurant, the other will follow, or if they are the only two left in the restaurant, that they will sell the restaurant to open their own café. At the end of the game, if one of them is on the winning team, the other will win as well!

You are the Food Critic 🖋(🎯). You are renowned for writing in-depth reviews about how a restaurant works and prepare their dishes... you can do that because you always disguise yourself as a chef and sneak into kitchens. Now that you are in this kitchen, if you are fired or asked to leave by anyone, you will reveal yourself and either criticise them or publish your review (where you can name and shame one staff in the process). The person you "attacked" would soon be fired as well! Note: For one Talent Poacher, there is a 30% chance they are evicted. For each additional Talent Poacher, add 20%.
